listitem.name: {@fm_sums}
listitem.action: twrp xset ft_inf_md5=$(md5sum "%tw_filename1%" | sed 's*%tw_filename1%**g') twrp xset ft_inf_sha1=$(sha1sum "%tw_filename1%" | sed 's*%tw_filename1%**g') twrp xset ft_inf_sha2=$(sha256sum "%tw_filename1%" | sed 's*%tw_filename1%**g') twrp xset ft_inf_sha5=$(sha512sum "%tw_filename1%" | sed 's*%tw_filename1%**g')

listitem.name: {@info}
listitem.action: link="%tw_filename1%" [ -L "%tw_filename1%" ] && link=$(readlink "%tw_filename1%") twrp xset ft_inf_real=$link twrp xset ft_inf_size=$(du -h "%tw_filename1%" | sed 's*%tw_filename1%**g'); twrp xset ft_inf_rights=$(stat -c '%%a (%%A)' "%tw_filename1%") twrp xset ft_inf_acc=$(stat -c %%x "%tw_filename1%") twrp xset ft_inf_mod=$(stat -c %%y "%tw_filename1%") twrp xset ft_inf_ch=$(stat -c %%z "%tw_filename1%")
